Reference ..if. EKT^...lB^.lL'.84# 28th November, 1S49. Sir, I am directed by the High Commissioner to inform you that the provisional recognition of the appointment of Mr, MOHAMMED MANSOURI as Vice-Consul for Saudi Arabia in Bombay has b<Sen announced in the Gazette of India by notification' in the Ministry of External Affairs No. 426-pt, dated the 16th November, 1949. * for Secretary, External Department. location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 8792/49 'Appointment of Saudi Arabian vice consul in Bombay'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4, these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a single letter from the Office of the High Commissioner for India to the Commonwealth Relations Office, regarding the appointment of Mr Mohammed Mansouri as Vice-Consul for Saudi Arabia at Bombay.
